title: Vista x64 Boot-Loader replacement (GUI) [Prophet07] (VISTA X64/X
description:
Vista x64 Boot-Loader replacement (GUI) [Prophet07] (VISTA X64/X32 ONLY)

You have a choice of 7 GUI Screens for now..Please look in each folder at the preview as
these cant be changed back to the original for now..

[1] CLICK ON THE STARTBAR & IN THE RUN BOX TYPE MSCONFIG THEN CLICK THE BOOT TAB & WERE IT
SAYS (No GUI Boot) PUT A CHECK IN THERE & CLICK APPLY..RESTART YOUR PC..

[2] LOOK INSIDE THE FOLDER AT EACH PREVIEW & CHOOSE THE ONE YOU WANT TO USE THEN COPY THE winload.exe.mui & BATCH FILE TO YOUR ROOT C: DRIVE..NOW RUN THE BATCH FILE

[3] RESTART YOUR PC..

EXTRA: TO PUT IT BACK TO NORMAL (NO GUI) JUST DO [2] & UNCHECK THE (No GUI Boot)

I MADE THIS MYSELF AS I DIDNT LIKE THE ORIGINAL GUI..BE WARNED YOU ARE CHANGING A SIMPLE 16
COLORS GUI FOR A 24BIT REPLACEMENT..THIS WILL ADD 3 OR 4 SECONDS EXTRA BOOT TIME..
